Name: Princess White bentonite with Lavender Scent Clumping Cat litter
Description:
Princess White bentonite with Lavender Scent Clumping Cat litter

Natural, effective and smells great
Lavender scent Cat Litter.
This cat litter is made from 100% natural that forms strong clumps that trap moisture and odours, making it easy to clean the litter box.
White bentonite is a type of natural clay used in cat litter because of its high absorption capacity and clumping ability.
The lavender scent of this cat litter creates a soothing and relaxing atmosphere for you and your cat, while also masking any unpleasant smells.
White bentonite also helps to control odour and prevent bacterial growth, making it a hygienic and eco-friendly choice for cat litter
its formula is 99.5% dust-free, and its ingredients are environmentally friendly, highly absorbent and quick-clumping.
Princess White bentonite with Lavender sent Cat Litter is also dust-free and low-tracking, so you can keep your home clean and cosy.
Try Princess White bentonite with Lavender sent Cat Litter 10L and 20L today and see the difference it makes for your cat’s comfort and happiness.

Name: KIT CAT MULTI CAT FORMULA CAT SAND, 30 L
Description:
KIT CAT MULTI CAT FORMULA CAT SAND, 30 L
Specially formulated by cat lovers to provide exceptional odour control and ease of cleaning. Its superior hard-clumping ability makes cleaning up a breeze – simply scoop the clump and throw it away. The rest of the litter remains clean, odourless and ready to reuse, making it a very economical and environmentally friendly choice.no chemical additive and is not harmful to pets or humans making it the most ideal cat litter for your kittens and cats.Contains No harmful chemicals, or dyes or makes any attempt to change what is naturally occurring.

Antibacterial & Non-Toxic.
Maximum Odor Control.
99% Dust Free & Non-Tracking.
Suitable for households w multiple cats.
Excellent Absorption.
Ultra Fast Clumping.
100% Money Back Guarantee.


How To Use

Step One: Fill Litter Box with approximately 2-3 inches of Kit Cat Cat Litter.
Step Two: Designed to form a clump when liquid touches instantly. Scoop up and dispose of the clumps and solids daily.
Step Three: It is advisable to empty and clean the entire litter box every month and dispose of the contents in the bin.

Name: Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter For Cats Lavender scent
Description:
Introducing Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter For Cats – the ultimate solution for maintaining a fresh and odor-free environment for both you and your feline friend. This innovative cat litter has been specially formulated to deliver superior performance, ensuring that your home stays clean and your cat remains comfortable.
Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter For Cats Lavender scent Features:


Exceptional Odor Control: Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter is designed to trap and neutralize unpleasant odors on contact. Say goodbye to unwanted smells, and enjoy a fresher, more inviting living space.


High Absorbency: Our advanced formula quickly absorbs moisture, preventing it from spreading and creating a mess. Your cat's litter box will stay dry, reducing the need for frequent changes.


Low Dust Formula: We understand the importance of a clean and healthy environment for both you and your cat. That's why Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter produces minimal dust, ensuring easy cleanup and reducing the risk of respiratory issues.


Clumping Action: This litter forms firm clumps that are easy to scoop, making daily maintenance a breeze. Simply remove the clumps and add fresh litter as needed to keep the box clean.


Long-Lasting: Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter lasts longer than traditional litters, saving you both time and money.


Directions for Use:


Fill the Litter Box: Start with a clean, dry litter box. Fill it with Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter to a depth of about 2-3 inches.


Maintain Regular Cleaning: Scoop out clumps and solid waste daily using a scoop designed for clumping litter. Dispose of the waste in a trash bag.


Refresh the Litter: As needed, top up the litter box with fresh Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter to maintain the recommended depth.


Regular Replacement: Completely replace the entire litter box with fresh Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter at least once a month, or as often as needed based on usage.


Dispose Responsibly: Please dispose of used litter and waste in accordance with local regulations and guidelines.


With Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter For Cats, you can enjoy a cleaner, fresher, and more pleasant living space while ensuring your cat's comfort and hygiene. Say goodbye to lingering odors and hello to a happier, healthier environment for you and your beloved feline companion. Order Lindocat SUPER CLEAN Litter today and experience the difference!
